Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians are favored to win with a moneyline of -187, while the Rays are underdogs at +156.
The total for the contest has been set at 7.5 runs.
Tanner Bibee and Zack Littell are the projected starting pitchers for the Guardians and Rays, respectively.
Others: The game is scheduled to take place at Progressive Field in Cleveland, Ohio, and will be broadcast on BSSUN.
